title: I furtherreconfirm that the work will be carried out in conformity with the provisions of IS standards and as per requirements of Regulations, Annexurefor Duties and Responsibilities of Professional on Record and the development work shall be as per approved plans and the structural design etc
clause_text: I furtherreconfirm that the work will be carried out in conformity with the provisions of IS standards and as per requirements of Regulations, Annexurefor Duties and Responsibilities of Professional on Record and the development work shall be as per approved plans and the structural design etc. The …………………………………… Municipal Corporation of Greater Mumbai, Mumbai.
section: SUPERVISION MEMO OF OTHER PROFESSIONAL ON RECORD
